title.ja-ro: Urameshi Ecchi - Omae no Karada de Ikasetekure

altTitles.ja: うらめしえっち　お前のカラダで逝かせてくれ!!

altTitles.en: Vengeful Sex - Let Me Go with Your Body!!

description.en:
A hottie exists at Wakeari Real Estate!? (*But he's a ghost... and furthermore, he's a virgin!?)

Akari, who moved to a very cheap apartment, suddenly gets her breasts fondled in the bathroom by a strange man. She's bewildered at how and where he entered the bathroom, while the man himself states that he is a ghost. He threatens Akari with the words: "If I don't get to have sex, I'll become an evil spirit". His lingering regret while he was still alive was that he was a virgin, and it seems that he can't rest in peace without resolving that regret...

On top of that, for the ghost Daichi, besides him being a "virgin" it seems that somehow, he has more hidden circumstances!? Having sex with a ghost is unthinkable! However, he's kind, he earnestly does his best and he'll treat me with incredible care...

Yikes, at this rate I'll be moved by him!!

This is a lovely yet naughty, fresh romance story!
description.ja:
ワケアリ物件にイケメン現る!?（※だけど幽霊…しかも童貞!?）
格安アパートに引っ越してきたあかりは、風呂場で突然見知らぬ男に胸を揉まれる。
どこから入ってきたのか困惑するあかりに彼は自ら幽霊だと名乗り、「Hしないと悪霊になる」とあかりを脅してくる。
彼は生前、童貞だったことが未練となり、成仏できずにいるらしい……。
さらに幽霊・大地には“童貞”以外にも何やら裏事情があるらしくて――!?
幽霊とえっちなんてありえない…!!
でも、優しいし一生懸命だし、ものすごく大事にしてくれる……。
ヤバイ！　このままじゃ絆されちゃう!!
ラブくてえっちな新感覚ラブストリー!!
